alert.note: Alert for Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: Flash Flood Statement issued January 31 at 3:26PM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...THE FLASH FLOOD WARNING HAS BEEN CANCELLED... FLASH FLOOD WARNING CANCELLED FOR TUTUILA AUNUU . Heavy rainfall has moved away from Tutuila and Aunu`u. However, a Flash Flood Watch remains in effect through Wednesday as a trough lingers near the islands. UA FAAMUTAINA LAPATAIGA MO TAFEGA MA LOLOGA OFISA O LE TAU PAGO PAGO AS 326 AOAULI ASO GAFUA IANUARI 31 2022 ...UA FAAMUTAINA le LAPATAIGA MO TAFEGA MA LOLOGA... UA FAAMUTAINA le LAPATAIGA MO TAFEGA MA LOLOGA MO TUTUILA ma AUNUU. Ua fa`aitiitia timuga i luga o Tutuila ma Aunu`u. Peita`i, o lo`o tumau pea le Nofo Va`ava`aiva mo Tafega ma Lologa e oo i le Aso Lulu, ona o uiga louloua o le tau o lo`o lata mai i le atunu`u. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... Mo ave-taavale, aua ne`i uia nofoaga po o ala-tele ua lolo-vaia. Ia aga`i atu i nofoaga mapu`epu`e. Ia ripotia tulaga louloua o le tau i le ofisa o le TEMCO. E latou te faailoa mai i le Ofisa o le Tau a outou ripoti.
info.instruction: Remain cautious when driving in low lying areas...and report any flooded roadways to the emergency operations center (EOC). They will relay your report to the National Weather Service Office.
